item.title: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Spell 'Employee' Every Time!
item.description: This Simple Trick Will Help You Instantly Spell ‘Employee’ Every Time! We’ve all been there: you’re writing an email to your boss, and you need to spell the word “employee”. You pause for a moment, trying to remember how to spell it, and then you realize you can’t. Don’t worry, this simple trick will help you spell “employee” every time! A. Definition of Employee An employee is someone who is hired to work for a company or organization.
